sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  div
    h1 Create your application: how does it works
    br
    p First answer a few questions about the app you want to create (time of game, number of rooms, ...)
    p Then define each and every single step of the game
    p Submit your information and receive a confirmation email
    p Wait 48 hours for the server to be created and then you'll receive the url your app will be available from
    p As soon as your app is available on the internet, you can easily change the information of your game in real time
    p Test the app, play with it, modify it until your happy with the result
    p Share the URL of the app to all the participants of the game
    el-button
      a(href='/create') Start creating my app
</template>

<script>
import { mapActions } from 'vuex'
import GeneralForm from '@/components/Forms/General'

export default {
  methods: {
    ...mapActions(['initializeApp'])
  },
  mounted () {
    // const loading = this.$loading();
    this.initializeApp()
      // .then(_ => {
      //   loading.close();
      // })
  }
}
</script>
